channel.title: Fusion-fx
channel.description:
Comments on Site template and forum theme?
Yes i made them both, and the link was a approved several months ago. If it needs to be re approved then if someone could approve it that would be great.
http://fusion-fx.info/index.php?id=home

item.title: Fusion-fx
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Yea, I’d like to see a background hover effect for the menu items, and only one menu (navigation). The scroll is a pain. Why have a scroll when you can just have it overflow normally? The fonts are a tad plain, and the italics on the normal text is annoying. Try putting that gray border between the banner and the horizontal navigation menu, and see how that turns out. It just feels a bit weird. Otherwise, it’s a nice and clean site. Keeping it real.

Read full topic

item.title: Fusion-fx
item.dc:creator: @welshy welshy
item.description:
@welshy wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:7, topic:123121”]I don’t see why everyone dislikes it =p, It looks good to me, the template is nice because it will fit most monitors and the paging system is really cool, I like the forum theme because it consists of my favorite colors =]. Any ways, nice job, it takes a while to do a website from scratch and to get it just right.[/quote] paging system by me braaaaaaa

Read full topic

item.title: Fusion-fx
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

I don’t see why everyone dislikes it =p, It looks good to me, the template is nice because it will fit most monitors and the paging system is really cool, I like the forum theme because it consists of my favorite colors =]. Any ways, nice job, it takes a while to do a website from scratch and to get it just right.

Read full topic

item.title: Fusion-fx
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

the only thing i relay don’t like is the size your main box could be bigger as in longer it seems a little to small. graphics side i cant say your site make it how you like it

Read full topic

item.title: Fusion-fx
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

On the top nav bar, seperate the links with a | and a few spaces Other than that, it’s nice. I’m bot a fan of it, but It isn’t bad xD

Read full topic

item.title: Fusion-fx
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Ummm, its very simple and in this case i wouldn’t say simple is best. If your going to use simple use your text and font to its maximum capabilities.

The blue text on the grey (in your forums) is very irritating.

It’s a good site though.

Read full topic

item.title: Fusion-fx
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:2, topic:123121”]1. Or lines between every news post.
2. Or use another font for the news.

I like 1 more, anyways very nice theme[/quote]
Thanks for the suggestion, added an hr tag in between news

Read full topic
